about_the_game:
The description will change when game fully releases. This description is for the Demo.

John's life takes a dark turn when he experiences haunting dreams of his deceased daughter. As he grapples with the loss, strange occurrences unfold, blurring the lines between reality and nightmare. The boundaries of John's sanity are tested as he attempts to escape the shadows of his past, only to be confronted by eerie manifestations that push him to the brink of terror. The thin veil between dreams and reality shatters in a nightmarish sequence, leaving John entangled in a web of ghostly apparitions and a sinister force that threatens to consume him. The story weaves a suspenseful narrative, exploring the fragile boundaries between the living and the dead, and the haunting consequences of a grief-stricken mind.

content_descriptors.notes:
- The game delves into the darkest corners of the human psyche, presenting unsettling imagery and themes that may disturb players on a psychological level.
- Characters in the game may use explicit language, including profanity and vulgar expressions, to convey fear, desperation, and aggression. Dialogue and written text may contain mature themes and explicit content.
- The game may depict or reference substance abuse, including the consumption of alcohol. Players may witness characters under the influence of alcohol.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 / 8 / 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 3.2 GHz, AMD Phenom II X4 955 - 4 Core, 3.2 GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Radeon R9 280 or Nvidia GeForce GTX 660
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: System requirements may change during the development of the game.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows 7 / 8 /10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-8400, AMD Ryzen 5 1600
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Radeon RX 580 or Nvidia GeForce GTX 1060 6GB
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 4 MB available space

short_description: The game has a tricky story that confuses you. But you have an opportunity to figure out what is happening. You will play three main characters in the game to understand the story. Be aware; each character tells you their side story. None of the storytellers are bad characters in their stories.
